name: Dotline Miami
description:
A very quick game I knocked up in Clickteam Fusion in a couple of hours. Just click the dots and don't let the lines touch you!

Music made with Figure.

11/07/16 UPDATE V1.0.2 - Put the music back in after it was accidentally disabled in the previous update.

11/07/16 UPDATE V1.0.1 - Added "Alexander in Uganda" splash screen at start.
